item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "In two decades I've lost a total of 789 pounds. I should be hanging from a charm bracelet." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "No one ever died from sleeping in an unmade bed. I have known mothers who remake the bed after their children do it because there is wrinkle in the spread or the blanket is on crooked. This is sick." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Some say our national pastime is baseball. Not me. It's gossip" -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "There's something wrong with a mother who washes out a measuring cup with soap and water after she's only measured water in it." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "When a child is locked in the bathroom with water running and he says he's doing nothing but the dog is barking, call 911. " -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Thanks to my mother, not a single cardboard box has found its way back into society. We receive gifts in boxes from stores that went out of business twenty years ago." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I guess the real reason that my wife and I had children is the same reason that Napoleon had for invading Russia: it seemed like a good idea at the time." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "No matter how calmly you try to referee, parenting will eventually produce bizarre behavior, and I'm not talking about the kids. Their behavior is always normal." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think - in a deeper voice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Ashleigh Brilliant
item.description: "I try to take one day at a time, but sometimes several days attack me at once." -- Ashleigh Brilliant

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "A two-year old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it." -- Jerry Seinfeld
